data.comment: The match is underway at Mapfre Stadium.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 4, Ismail Elfath signals a throw-in for Columbus, close to Minnesota's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Columbus.
Ismail Elfath awards Columbus a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Columbus.
Goal kick for Minnesota at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 8, Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Columbus in the half of Minnesota.
Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 10, Pedro Santos gets his shot on target but fails to score for Columbus.
Ismail Elfath signals a Minnesota throw-in in Columbus's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Columbus in Columbus.
In the minute 13, Minnesota to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
Can Columbus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
Throw-in for Columbus in the half of Minnesota.
In the minute 16, Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Fatai Alashe.
In the minute 19, Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team has substituted Fatai Alashe with Sebastian Berhalter. Caleb Porter is thus making his first change.
Throw-in for Minnesota at Mapfre Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Minnesota.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Columbus.
Jonathan Mensah (Columbus) strikes at Mapfre Stadium but his header is cleared.
Kei Kamara (Minnesota) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 29, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lucas Zelarrayan heads in to make it 1-0 at Mapfre Stadium.
Pedro Santos instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 33, Free kick Columbus.
Minnesota needs to be cautious. Columbus have an attacking throw-in.
Luis Diaz for Columbus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 34, Minnesota have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Columbus are coming forward and Pedro Santos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 36, Columbus have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Minnesota push upfield but Ismail Elfath quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 40, In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kei Kamara for the away team is judged to be offside.
Columbus have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Columbus.
Minnesota's Hassani Dotson misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Minnesota defence as Luis Diaz fires in a strike for Columbus.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
In the minute 45, Columbus's Milton Valenzuela is on target but unsuccessful.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Penalty! Ismail Elfath points to the spot, great chance for Columbus...
In the minute 45, Columbus are awarded a penalty at Mapfre Stadium. Lucas Zelarrayan takes the kick ... But misses!
Lucas Zelarrayan of Columbus gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ismail Elfath awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is now underway.
Free kick Columbus.
In the minute 47, Ismail Elfath signals a Columbus throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Throw-in for Minnesota close to the penalty box.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Columbus.
Jose Aja (Minnesota) has received a yellow card from Ismail Elfath.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Minnesota.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Minnesota.
Throw-in for Minnesota at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Columbus.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 56, Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Columbus close to the penalty box.
In the minute 59, Columbus's Pedro Santos gets in a shot on goal at Mapfre Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Columbus have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 59, Columbus have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
Columbus's Gyasi Zardes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the away team in Columbus.
Free kick Columbus.
Minnesota's Romain Metanire has been booked in Columbus.
In the minute 62, Jonathan Mensah for Columbus drives towards goal at Mapfre Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 63, Jose Aja (Minnesota) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ismail Elfath awards Columbus a goal kick.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 65, Milton Valenzuela hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Columbus for Columbus.
In Columbus Columbus drive forward through Gyasi Zardes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
In the minute 67, Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Columbus.
Minnesota make their first substitution with Raheem Edwards replacing Thomas Chacon.
In the minute 70, Goal! Columbus extend their lead to 2-0 through Pedro Santos.
Lucas Zelarrayan with an assist there.
Adrian Heath is making the team's second substitution at Mapfre Stadium with Aaron Schoenfeld replacing Kei Kamara.
In the minute 75, Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Minnesota capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Minnesota's Emanuel Reynoso breaks free at Mapfre Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Youness Mokhtar is replacing Luis Diaz for the home team.
Derrick Etienne is on a sub for Lucas Zelarrayan for Columbus.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Minnesota.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
At Mapfre Stadium, Chase Gasper has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 81, Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ismail Elfath awards the home team a throw-in.
Minnesota are pushing forward but Aaron Schoenfeld's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 82, Columbus have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Columbus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
In the minute 85, Ismail Elfath blows against Columbus's Gyasi Zardes for offside.
Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
In Columbus Columbus attack through Youness Mokhtar. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Minnesota at Mapfre Stadium.
Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Columbus.
Throw-in for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Columbus.
Robin Lod puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
Great play from Chase Gasper to set up the goal.
Columbus have a goal kick.
Throw-in Minnesota.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Columbus.
Minnesota needs to be cautious. Columbus have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Minnesota.
Minnesota's Michael Boxall is whistled for offside at Mapfre Stadium.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Artur (Columbus) gets a yellow card.
